item.title: Microsoft SQL Server 2019
item.description: This document provides links to information and resources for Microsoft SQL Server 2019 (15.x) or later for Windows and Linux. Home: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/sql-server/sql-server-2019 Download: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/sql-server/sql-server-downloads What’s New SQL Server In-Memory Database technologies leverage modern hardware innovation to deliver unparalleled performance and scale. SQL Server 2019 (15.x) builds on earlier innovations in this area, such as in-memory online transaction processing (OLTP), to unlock a new level of scalability across all your database workloads.
